circulars.title: Revised Basel III Capital Guidelines for UCBs
circulars.description: Comprehensive guidelines on capital adequacy, capital conservation buffer, and disclosure requirements for Urban Co-operative Banks implementing Basel III framework.
keyRequirements: Minimum CRAR of 9% for all UCBs
Tier 1 capital minimum of 6%
Capital Conservation Buffer: Tier 1 (1.5%), Tier 2 (1.0%)
Leverage ratio of 3.5% for Tier 1 and above UCBs
Pillar 3 disclosures for scheduled and Tier 1 UCBs

circulars.title: Cyber Security Framework for UCBs
circulars.description: Comprehensive cyber security framework requiring UCBs to implement robust information security measures, conduct annual cyber security audits, and maintain incident response capabilities.
keyRequirements: Board-approved cyber security policy
Appointment of CISO for Tier 1 UCBs (recommended for others)
Annual cyber security audit by CERT-In empanelled auditor
Business Continuity Plan with annual testing
Cyber security incident reporting to RBI within timelines
Information security awareness training for staff

circulars.title: Asset Liability Management Guidelines for UCBs
circulars.description: Guidelines for managing interest rate risk and liquidity risk through structured Asset Liability Management framework including ALCO constitution and gap analysis.
keyRequirements: Board-approved ALM policy
Constitution of Asset Liability Committee (ALCO)
Monthly gap analysis for 1-3 years time buckets
Statement of interest rate sensitivity
Liquidity contingency funding plan
ALM returns submission to RBI

circulars.title: Fit & Proper Norms for UCB Directors
circulars.description: Revised norms for fit and proper criteria for directors of Urban Co-operative Banks including background verification, qualification requirements, and disqualification criteria.
keyRequirements: Background verification for all directors
No criminal history involving financial offenses
Minimum qualification and experience requirements
Declaration of related party interests
Annual fit and proper confirmation
Director rotation policy

circulars.title: Large Exposure Norms for UCBs
circulars.description: Guidelines on single borrower and group exposure limits for UCBs to ensure diversification of credit risk and prevent concentration risk.
keyRequirements: Single borrower exposure limit: 25% of eligible capital
Group exposure limit: 55% of eligible capital
Exposure reporting for amounts above 10% of capital
Quarterly reporting to RBI through DAKSH
Board approval for exposures above 20%
Excess exposure regularization within specified time

circulars.title: Risk Management Committee Guidelines for UCBs
circulars.description: Guidelines for constitution and functioning of Risk Management Committee including composition, meeting frequency, and responsibilities for overseeing risk management framework.
keyRequirements: RMC with minimum 3 directors including Chairman
Quarterly meetings minimum
Oversight of risk management policies
Review of risk profile and capital adequacy
Reporting to Board on risk matters
Risk-based supervision implementation
